REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits the naming of buildings after public officials
Summary: Prohibits the naming of buildings after public officials.
LawCode: Add ยง79-a, Pub Off L; add ยง7-h, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the legislative law, in relation to the prohibition of naming buildings after public officials
